text: Erica Jasmin Mena (Born November 8, 1987) is an actress, model, writer and Hip hop singer. Mena is known for her appearances in the show Love & Hip Hop: New York .She has wrote the books Chronicles of a Confirmed Bachelorette and Underneath It All. == Personal life == Mena is openly bisexual. Mena is of Dominican and Puerto Rican ancestry. She has a son, King Javien Conde (born in March 1, 2007) with video director and rapper Raul Conde. A member of Fat Joeâ€™s Terror Squad. Conde died on November 22, 2023. Mena was previously engaged to Bow Wow. In December 2018, Mena became engaged to rapper and television personality Safaree Samuels. On October 7, 2019, she and Samuels married at the White Castle in New Jersey. Their daughter was born in 2020. On May 4, 2021, she announced that she and Samuels were expecting their second child together. On May 25, 2021, TMZ reported that Mena officially filed for divorce from Samuels. Their son was born in 2021. == Filmography == *Kourtney & Khloe Take Miami (2009) *Love & Hip Hop: New York (2011-2015) *The Show with Vinny (2013) *The Trisha Goddard Show (2013) *106 & Park (2014) *CSI: Cyber (2014) *Bad Girls Club: Social Disruption (2016-2017) *Wild 'n Out (2017) *Master of None (2017) *Bad Girls Club: East Meets West (2017) *Scared Famous (2017) *Two Ways with Erica Mena (2025) == Notes == Category:1987 births Category:Living people
title: Erica Mena
